member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridEditState
member.summary: States of the row items.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridEditState.None
member.summary: Default state which means the row value will just be showed.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridEditState.New
member.summary: Row values will be visible in the new item edit mode.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridEditState.Edit
member.summary: Row values will be visible in the row editing mode.

member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridEditMode
member.summary: Specifes the grid editing modes.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridEditMode.Form
member.summary: Values will be edited in the edit form.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridEditMode.Inline
member.summary: Values will be edited within the inline edit row.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridEditMode.Popup
member.summary: Values will be edited in the modal dialog.

member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridColumnType
member.summary: Defines the column editor type.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridColumnType.Text
member.summary: Column can accept string values.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridColumnType.Numeric
member.summary: Column can accept only numeric values.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridColumnType.Check
member.summary: Column can accept only boolean values.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridColumnType.Date
member.summary: Column can accept only datetime values.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridColumnType.Select
member.summary: Column can be used to select multiple values.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridColumnType.Command
member.summary: Column is used only to represent commands like edit, save, etc.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridColumnType.MultiSelect
member.summary: Column is used only to represent the multiselect command.

member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType
member.summary: Defines the supported aggregate calculation types.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType.None
member.summary: Aggregation will not be calculated.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType.Sum
member.summary: Summary of numeric value.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType.Average
member.summary: Average value of numeric value.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType.Min
member.summary: Min value of numeric value.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType.Max
member.summary: Max value of numeric value.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType.Count
member.summary: Count all values that are not null.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType.TrueCount
member.summary: Count all boolean values that are true.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridAggregateType.FalseCount
member.summary: Count all boolean values that are false.

member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridPagerPosition
member.summary: Defines the supported positions of the pagination.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridPagerPosition.Top
member.summary: Positions the pagination above the table.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridPagerPosition.Bottom
member.summary: Positions the pagination below the table.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridPagerPosition.TopAndBottom
member.summary: Positions the pagination on above and below the table.

member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridSortMode
member.summary: Defines the sort mode of the data grid.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridSortMode.Single
member.summary: The data grid can only be sorted by one column at a time.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridSortMode.Multiple
member.summary: The data grid can sorted by multiple columns.

member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridSelectionMode
member.summary: Defines the selection mode of the data grid.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridSelectionMode.Single
member.summary: The data grid can only select a row at a time.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridSelectionMode.Multiple
member.summary: The data grid can select multiple rows with checkbox support.

member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridCommandMode
member.summary: Defines the command mode of the data grid.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridCommandMode.Default
member.summary: Default state which means that both defined commands and button row will render(only if ButtonRowTemplate is defined).

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridCommandMode.Commands
member.summary: Only defined commands will render.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridCommandMode.ButtonRow
member.summary: Only button row will render.

member.name: T:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridResizeMode
member.summary: Defines the resize mode of the data grid columns.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridResizeMode.Header
member.summary: The data grid can only be resized from the columns header.

member.name: F:Blazorise.DataGrid.DataGridResizeMode.Columns
member.summary: The data grid can be resized from the entire column area.
